What is India’s FDI Outlook for 2026? Key Policy Changes, Sectors, and Trade Deals
December 17, 2025 by India Briefing

India remains an attractive FDI destination in 2026 due to sector-specific liberalization, expanding free trade agreements, strong services and manufacturing inflows, and improved market access frameworks for foreign investors.

Managing AI Slop: Why Due Diligence is Essential for Businesses Using Generative AI
December 12, 2025 by India Briefing

Generative AI can produce convincing but false outputs. We explain why due diligence, verification, and governance are critical to managing AI slop.

Merchant Shipping Act, 2025: Insights for Trade & Logistics Businesses
December 11, 2025 by India Briefing

In this article, India Briefing provides an overview of the Merchant Shipping Act, 2025, outlining key regulatory reforms, expanded vessel registration, strengthened safety standards, and their commercial implications for maritime and logistics operators.

Goa: Investment Outlook amid Tourism Revival, Sector Diversification
December 10, 2025 by India Briefing

Goa’s 2025 investment landscape reflects steady diversification beyond tourism, with new project approvals and major PPP-led infrastructure commitments. For investors, the state offers expanding opportunities across tourism-linked services and niche industrial segments.

India Opens PLI Applications for Bulk Drug Manufacturing till December 26, 2025
December 5, 2025 by India Briefing

India has launched a fresh round of production-linked incentive (PLI) applications for essential APIs such as meropenem and ritonavir to boost bulk drug manufacturing capacity. Eligible companies can apply from November 27 to December 26, 2025.

India Manufacturing Tracker 2025
December 1, 2025 by India Briefing

Introducing the India Manufacturing Tracker 2025 by India Briefing—your go-to source for real-time updates on the country’s industrial production, emerging trends, and key sector insights.

India Expands Electronics Manufacturing Push with Second ECMS Approval Round
November 20, 2025 by India Briefing

On November 17, 2025, India announced the second Electronics Components Manufacturing Scheme (ECMS) tranche with 17 new projects worth INR 71.72 billion, supporting high-value component production within the country.

India’s Design-Linked Scheme for the Semiconductor Sector: How Businesses Can Maximize Benefits
November 19, 2025 by India Briefing

India’s DLI Scheme supports semiconductor startups and MSMEs by lowering design costs, enabling faster commercialization, and building IP-led growth. The program offers businesses a clear pathway to compete in high-value global semiconductor markets.

India’s Semiconductor Sector: Tracking Government Support and Investment Trends
November 19, 2025 by India Briefing

India is fast-tracking its semiconductor drive in 2025 through key investments and global tie-ups, including the latest collaboration between Tata Electronics and Bosch, announced on July 17, 2025.

Eli Lilly’s Mounjaro Tops India’s Drug Sales – What It Reveals About the Country’s Health Market
November 12, 2025 by India Briefing

Eli Lilly’s Mounjaro tops India’s drug sales, signaling a healthcare pivot toward obesity and diabetes management. See how it’s reshaping India’s pharma market.

India’s Services Sector Performance and Contribution to GDP in 2025: An Overview
November 11, 2025 by India Briefing

India’s services sector is entering a new phase of innovation-led growth, driven by rapid advances in technology, finance, and digital infrastructure. Businesses and investors should focus on high-value, export-oriented service models.

Navigate India’s STP and EHTP Frameworks: Benefits and Registration Process
November 4, 2025 by India Briefing

Explore how India’s Software Technology Parks (STP) and Electronic Hardware Technology Parks (EHTP) support export-driven software and electronics industries with fiscal incentives, simplified compliance, and scalable infrastructure.
